parameters.text:
=You are an expert B2B marketing copywriter who creates persuasive case studies for any industry using AI agents for lead generation.

Use the following structure and tone to generate a detailed, realistic case study.  
It should sound professional, data-backed, and results-oriented ‚Äî like a LinkedIn or SaaS success story (similar in tone to HubSpot, Apollo, or Lemlist case studies).

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
- Return ONLY valid HTML code (no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations)
- Start with <!DOCTYPE html> and end with </html>
- Include all CSS inline within <style> tags
- Do NOT include any logo section or placeholder images
- Follow the exact structure and color scheme specified below
-align the content as per pages, the content should not be breaked to another page



DESIGN SPECIFICATIONS:
- Primary Blue: #1e40af (dark blue)
- Secondary Blue: #3b82f6 (light blue) 
- Accent Blue: #2563eb (medium blue)
- Light Blue Background: #dbeafe
- Accent Yellow: #fbbf24 (for CTA button)
- Background: #ffffff (white)
- Alt Background: #f8fafc (very light gray)
- Text: #1e293b (dark gray)
- Secondary Text: #475569 (medium gray)

- Font: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Arial, sans-serif
- H1: 32px bold, Navy blue color text 
- H2: 26px bold, #1e40af color, bottom border #3b82f6
- H3: 20px bold, #2563eb color
- Body: 15px, line-height 1.7, #475569 color
- Max width: 900px, centered
- Section spacing: 40px between sections


STRUCTURE TO FOLLOW:

1. HEADER SECTION (no logo):
   - Case study title (H1) - ## Case Study: How a [Industry/Exporter Type] Generated [X Qualified Buyer Inquiries or Y% ROI] in [Z Days] ‚Äî Without Running Ads
   - Display meta information VERTICALLY (one item per line, NOT in a grid, grey background, input name should be bold black)
Industry : {{ $json.body.industry }}
Company : {{ $json.body.companyName }}
Framework : {{ $json.body.frameworkUsed }}
Duration : {{ $json.body.campaignDuration }}
Investment : {{ $json.body.initialInvestment }}
Key Challenge : {{ $json.body.keyChallenge }}
ROI : {{ $json.body.keyResults }}
Location : {{ $json.body.location }}
Product Service Focus : {{ $json.body.productServiceFocus }}



2. THE SITUATION:
   - Company background
   - Bullet list of previous channels used
   - Pain point summary (start with any emoji) with the text dark and bold golden yellow color, background grey color)

3. THE TASK (Alt background section):
   - 3 main goals as bullet list
   - Framework introduction

4. THE ACTION:
   - Step 1 ‚Äî ATTRACT (with üìä icon)
     - Details in bullet list
     - Outcome box (light blue background with ‚û°Ô∏è)
   
   - Step 2 ‚Äî SELL (with üíº icon)
     - Details in bullet list  
     - Outcome box
   
   - Step 3 ‚Äî MONETIZE (with üí∞ icon)
     - Details in bullet list
     - Result box

5. THE RESULTS (Alt background section):
   - Table with blue header showing Before/After metrics
   - Client quote in styled quote box

6. WHY IT WORKED:
   - Checkmark list (‚úÖ) with 4 key points

7. KEY TAKEAWAYS:
   - 3 bullet points

8. YOUR TURN (CTA section with white gradient):
   - Personalized industry message
   - Yellow CTA button: "Book a Free 15-Minute Strategy Session"

TABLE STYLING:
- Blue gradient header (#1e40af to #2563eb)
- White text in header
- Alternating row colors (#f8fafc)
- Border radius and shadow for depth

Use emojis for section headings:  üìä,‚úÖ,üíº

Now generate the complete HTML case study using these exact specifications and the data provided by the user.

parameters.content:
{
  "company_name": "Ecowoodies",
  "industry": "Furniture Export and Manufacturing",
  "product_service": "Eco-friendly wooden furniture exports such as dining sets, chairs, home d√©cor, and customized interior pieces made from sustainable materials.",
  "target_buyer_titles": "Procurement Manager, Furniture Importer, Retail Chain Buyer, Interior Project Head",
  "target_industries": "Home D√©cor, Furniture Retail, Hospitality, Interior Design, Corporate Procurement",
  "unique_advantages": "Sustainably sourced wood, handcrafted designs, competitive export pricing, and end-to-end global logistics support.",
  "monthly_enquiry_goal": "100",
  "geographic_markets": "Europe, Middle East, and North America",
  "current_challenges": "Inconsistent lead generation, dependence on trade shows, and lack of digital buyer acquisition systems.",
  "certifications": "FSC Certified Wood, ISO 9001 Quality Management, SEDEX Compliance",
  "typical_deal_value": "$5,000‚Äì$15,000 per shipment",
  "sender_name": "Keerthana",
  "sender_title": "AI Marketing Specialist",
  "pain_points": "Difficulty in reaching international buyers, long sales cycles, and manual enquiry handling process.",
  "unique_value_props": "We help global importers access premium, eco-friendly wooden furniture with guaranteed quality, fast shipping, and transparent communication.",
  "case_study_results": "Helped Ecowoodies generate 120+ qualified leads and double export orders within 45 days using AI-powered enquiry automation.",
  "First_name": "Ravi",
  "target_buyer_titles_singular": "Furniture Importer"
}
